sentences.english: If do not appreciate the local scenery and inner world.
sentences.chinese: 如果不欣賞本地風光和內心世界。

sentences.english: What you said opened up his inner world.
sentences.chinese: 你所說的揭示了他的內心世界。

sentences.english: To create an interior world, leafy trees are planted into a dug ground.
sentences.chinese: 要創建一個內心世界，葉菜種植樹木挖成一個理由。

sentences.english: Give others a peek into your inner world.
sentences.chinese: 給別人走進你內心世界的機會。

sentences.english: I wanted to move past my monkey mind and reclaim control of my inner space.
sentences.chinese: 我想通過做白日夢來開拓我對自己內心世界的控制。

sentences.english: Nam believe's that no one can take Kin's place in her heart.
sentences.chinese: 家嵐相信，在她的內心世界裏沒有人可以取代陸堅。

sentences.english: But of the inner Tynan he knew next to nothing.
sentences.chinese: 但是他對泰納恩的內心世界幾乎一無所知。

sentences.english: Your inner world of the mind reflects externally as the outer world of perception.
sentences.chinese: 你的內心世界作爲對外在世界的理解反映出來。

sentences.english: Thus, we can learn more the inner world of the Guxian ancient people.
sentences.chinese: 由此，我們可以瞭解到更多古縣人民的內心世界。

sentences.english: Good books can enrich man'slife. ( inner )
sentences.chinese: 好書可以豐富人的內心世界。

definition: to pry into or spy on/to snoop/to peep/to poke one's nose into/to peer/to get a glimpse of
to sense/to perceive/to come to realize/to be aware
to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
